Skid SKM99032 Mitsubishi Pajero Evo Dakar 1999 Sven Quandt/Tiefenbach #212 (1:43)

This was the second Dakar for Sven Quandt & Philipp Tiefenbach having finished 11th in 1998. Their Pajero was a T1 (or Production Cross-Country Car) class entry. I can't find any information about them finishing the rally so I assume they were a DNF. Even Mitsubishi's Motor Sports site doesn't mention anything about them after stage 8 when they were in 20th place overall.


Sources
Mitsubishi Motors/1999 Granada-Dakar Rally/Rally Cars
